document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Her </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0c070">gallant </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#98acdc">note </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#98acdc">Endows </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">us </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">like </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#98acdc">friend </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">When </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d4ff44">summer </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#98acdc">cleaves </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">away </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
